thread.title_full: Mercy Masika's new song 'Huyu Yesu' saves suicidal fan - VIDEO - Nairobi News

title: Mercy Masika's new song 'Huyu Yesu' saves suicidal fan - VIDEO - Nairobi News
text:
Mercy Masika’s new song ‘Huyu Yesu’ saves suicidal fan – VIDEO Posted on Feb 6, 2017 10117 Views Kenyan gospel singer Mercy Masika (right) with her Tanzanian counterpart Angel Bernard. PHOTO | BONIFACE NYAGA By BONIFACE NYAGA 
Kenyan gospel singer Mercy Masika started the year on a high with the release of her new collabo with Tanzanian gospel artiste Angel Bernard. 
When pair decided to do the ‘ Huyu Yesu ‘ song they really did not know what they were getting into. 
“My producer is the one who introduced us. We had actually never met before we begun recording but we just clicked,” Mercy explained to Nairobi News . 
“It was such a divine connection, it is such a rear thing to find someone that you connect with someone on so many levels.” 
The song has been well received across the two East African countries. 
On her first trip to Kenya since the release of the song, Angel Bernard gave an exclusive interview to Nairobi News. 
She revealed: “People love Mercy back at home, so it’s no wonder that the song is doing very well. I even got a message from a fan who wanted to committed suicide on December 31 when the song came out. She was going through a tough situation and she was planning to kill herself until she watched our song on YouTube.” Latest Stories
